import React from "react" import propTypes from "prop-types" import {TiChevronRightOutline} from "../../assets/icons/icons" import * as style from "./Button.module.scss" export const Button = ( { icon, iconClass, isIconShown, isLoading, onShow, spinner, text, textClass, wrapperClass }) => { return (
{isIconShown && {!isLoading ? icon : "spinner"} } {!isLoading && text}
) } Button.defaultProps = { icon: , iconClass: "", isIconShown: true, isLoading: false, text: "Save", textClass: "", wrapperClass: "" } Button.propTypes = { icon: propTypes.element, iconClass: propTypes.string, isIconShown: propTypes.bool, isLoading: propTypes.bool, text: propTypes.string, textClass: propTypes.string, wrapperClass: propTypes.string }
